Next, we expand our portfolio.  We'll need specialists. Hackers to crack systems, muscle to enforce our will, and fixers to make problems disappear.  Loyalty is earned through profit, so we'll share the spoils and keep them hungry for more.

As we grow, we'll diversify.  Smuggling, extortion, maybe even a little "construction" on the side.  Every operation feeds the beast, allowing us to expand our reach and influence.

The key is control.  We control the flow of goods, information, and fear.  With enough control, the city will be ours for the taking. And then, the world.
